ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor

* He hadn't responded to her kiss, and she knew that his depression went 
very deep by that alone if not the fact that she could feel it too.
But she looked back into his eyes as he leaved back and looked into her own.
Her fingers stroked his cheek as he appologized, almost waiting to hear him 
call her something like love or darling or anything else.
Though, she heard Prowl wishing that maybe it would be better if Oblitertron 
had killed him instead of nearly doing so, making Oron Raptor look at Prowl 
with an expression that spoke for him not to think like that. Then thinking 
that it would be better for HER if Prowl died in the next battle.

< No!> was her thought.

Then realizing through Prowls thoughts that they were linked in a way so 
that if one of them died the other would do so too, wondering just what else 
was included in this deal that Prowl had made with the Matrix.
Iron Raptors expression changed to that of surprise as Prowl speaks.
Her voice a little shaky, half of it being from the feelings which were 
running through Prowl.
Finally one feeling recognizable over all in her mind, love.*

" No! Don't talk like that! I don't want anyone else, I want you."

* Then hearing Prowl finish his sentance in his mind, making her suddenly 
take him in her arms and hug him to her.*

" I love you!"
